pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: In Hollywood, an "Oscar" is the highest accolade.
sentences.chinese: 奥斯卡金像奖是好莱坞最高荣誉奖。

sentences.english: The best-known movie awards are the AcademyAwards.
sentences.chinese: 最有名的电影奖是奥斯卡金像奖。

sentences.english: Hepburn attends the Academy Awards ceremony in 1975.
sentences.chinese: 1975年赫本参加奥斯卡金像奖庆典。

sentences.english: The film went on to win six Academy Awards.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片后来赢得了六座奥斯卡金像奖。

sentences.english: The film won an Oscar award for 1985.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影获1985年奥斯卡金像奖。
2013年是第八十五届奥斯卡金像奖。

sentences.english: Earlier the film had missed out on two early Oscar opportunities as the 83rd Academy Awards began.
sentences.chinese: 稍早时候影片错失了两项第83届奥斯卡金像奖。

sentences.english: Her career climaxed in the award of an Oscar.
sentences.chinese: 这部影片应该人围奥斯卡金像奖。

definition: Golden Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival
Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival
Grammy Award (US prize for music recording)/also written 葛萊美獎|葛莱美奖
Golden Horse Film Festival and Awards
Silver Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival

pinyin: ping2 shen3 tuan2 te4 bie2 jiang3

definition: Hundred flowers film prize, awarded since 1962
